one_line_title.JP: Never gonna let you down, never gonna run around and desert you

description.JP: Get behind the wheel of Honda's flagship compact car, the Fit RS '10! Be as quick as you can around the tricky corners and aim for a super lap! A special present awaits you if you can win the gold award!
